original_text: He must put his hand on the goat's head and then he must kill it. He must do this where they kill animals in front of the Lord for the burnt offering. It is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그 숫염소의 머리에 안수하고 여호와 앞 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 잡을지니 이는 속죄제라

sentences.original_text: He must put his hand on the goat's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 염소의 머리에 손을 얹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and then he must kill it
He must do this where they kill animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 짐승을 죽이는 곳에서 이것을 해야 합니다
